sys_metadata_link.payload:
<?xml version="1.0" encoding="UTF-8"?><record_update table="sys_script_fix">
    <sys_script_fix action="INSERT_OR_UPDATE">
        <before>false</before>
        <description>Sets 'com.snc.on_call_rotation.notification.voice.use_notify_call' property to false on upgrade.</description>
        <name>Set On-Call Notify properties</name>
        <record_for_rollback>false</record_for_rollback>
        <script><![CDATA[(function() {
	if (GlidePluginManager.isZboot())
		return;
	var prevWF = gs.getSession().getWorkflow();
	try {
		gs.getSession().setWorkflow(true);
		gs.setProperty('com.snc.on_call_rotation.notification.voice.use_notify_call', false);
	}
	finally{
		gs.getSession().setWorkflow(prevWF);
	}
})();]]></script>
        <sys_class_name>sys_script_fix</sys_class_name>
        <sys_created_by>admin</sys_created_by>
        <sys_created_on>2021-10-21 07:31:42</sys_created_on>
        <sys_id>1496fa0aeb9f70106de683402a522843</sys_id>
        <sys_mod_count>1</sys_mod_count>
        <sys_name>Set On-Call Notify properties</sys_name>
        <sys_package display_value="On-Call Scheduling" source="com.snc.on_call_rotation">37d4c9836de620100acb70b3534330d3</sys_package>
        <sys_policy/>
        <sys_scope display_value="Global">global</sys_scope>
        <sys_update_name>sys_script_fix_1496fa0aeb9f70106de683402a522843</sys_update_name>
        <sys_updated_by>admin</sys_updated_by>
        <sys_updated_on>2021-11-08 10:41:30</sys_updated_on>
        <unloadable>true</unloadable>
    </sys_script_fix>
</record_update>
